ValidationRule.description: Makes sure that the user changes Tags the Case before Closing
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(IsClosed), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed") ), OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(FCS_Case_Reason__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(FCS_CaseType__c)), AND( ISBLANK(TEXT(FCS_CaseResolution__c)), ISBLANK(FCS_CaseResolutionDetails__c) ) ), NOT($User.LastName = 'SAS Automation Process'), NOT(RecordType.Name = 'Claim'), NOT(RecordType.Name = 'Customer Claim') )
